name: Deep Miner
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam 113 - "Stuck in a loop". The loop here is that you're constantly going down to get more ore to sell and then buy upgrades to get better ore.

The deeper you go the better ore you can find but beware your fuel amount and drill level. You can't mine all ores depending on your drill level.

For more information click the Help button in the main menu.

Controls ----------------------

W / Up Arrow Key - Move forward

A / Left Arrow Key - Rotate left

D/ Right Arrow Key - Rotate right

S/ Down Arrow Key - Move back

Tab - Open/Close Inventory

------------------------------------
